alert.note: Alert for Mecosta; Montcalm; Newaygo (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 06 at 9:23AM EST until November 06 at 10:30AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Newaygo County in west central Michigan... Mecosta County in central Michigan... Northwestern Montcalm County in central Michigan... * Until 1030 AM EST. * At 922 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of White Cloud to near Grant, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Big Rapids... Newaygo... Howard City... Lakeview... Grant... Morley... Mecosta... Canadian Lakes... Croton... Bridgeton... Remus... Millbrook... Sand Lake... Barryton... Stanwood... Pierson... Sylvester... Rodney... Amble... Altona... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
